body_html:
Same issue, received similar stack trace when using the pre-build nvidia-docker image of latest pytorch.
Additionally, tried to use the distributed module with the latest pytorch whl file + recompiling from sources and I get a similar stack trace where the exception is raised in gloo::CudaHostPointer::~CudaHostPointer() (). Head was 66d24c5 when recompiling from sources.
body_text:
Same issue, received similar stack trace when using the pre-build nvidia-docker image of latest pytorch.
Additionally, tried to use the distributed module with the latest pytorch whl file + recompiling from sources and I get a similar stack trace where the exception is raised in gloo::CudaHostPointer::~CudaHostPointer() ().  Head was 66d24c5 when recompiling from sources.
body:
Same issue, received similar stack trace when using the pre-build nvidia-docker image of latest pytorch.
Additionally, tried to use the distributed module with the latest pytorch whl file + recompiling from sources and I get a similar stack trace where the exception is raised in gloo::CudaHostPointer<float>::~CudaHostPointer() ().  Head was 66d24c50671fa1886fed65128950240d809b4866 when recompiling from sources.
